features: Upper: A casual sandal with full grain leather straps. Hook and loop strap closure for an easy adjustable fit. Synthetic lining
Footbed: PU-like EVA with leather topcover
Midsole: Available in EVA wrap with studded welt, cork wrap with studded welt or jute with rubber welt
Outsole: Molded rubber cupsole construction with iconic Sorel scallops
